channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-20112] Accumulo-Hive (managed) table creation fails with strict managed table checks: Table is marked as a managed table but is not transactional
item.description: Similar to HIVE-20085 and HIVE-20111. Accumulo-Hive (managed) table creation fails with strict managed table checks: Table is marked as a managed table but is not transactional
item.summary: Accumulo-Hive (managed) table creation fails with strict managed table checks: Table is marked as a managed table but is not transactional

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
